title: ISic000004. Inscription recording construction of a sphaeristrium by a father and son
body:
Facsimile Images

⁦ - - - - - - - - - - ⁩
[.] Cornelius ((·)) P(ubli) ((·)) f(ilius) ((·)) Gramme[---]
[.]+ipax ((·)) et P(ublius) ((·)) Cornelius ((·)) P(ubli) ((·)) f(ilius) ((·)) P(ubli) ((·)) n(epos) ((·)) Long[---]
p̣ater ((·)) et ((·)) f(ilius) ((·)) pro ((·)) honore ((·)) (duum)virạ[tus]
5[s]phaeristerium ((·)) fecerunt

Apparatus criticus

Text checked against photograph; illegible line 1 requires fresh autopsy.
